alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Dade; Murray; Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 10:52AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...SNOW WILL AFFECT CATOOSA...NORTH CENTRAL MURRAY...WHITFIELD... CENTRAL WALKER AND DADE COUNTIES THROUGH MIDDAY... Snow, possibly mixed with sleet at times, is expected to continue across far northwest Georgia through at least midday. HAZARD...Snow. SOURCE...Public reports. ACCUMULATION...Accumulations of up to 1 inch of snow are expected over the next 1-2 hours, especially over grassy surfaces. Bridges and overpasses may also begin experiencing light dusting of snow. TEMPERATURES...Temperatures are expected to remain near freezing. IMPACT...Icy spots on roads can be expected, especially bridges and overpasses. Expect travel to become more difficult through early this afternoon. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Ringgold, Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Varnell, Lookout Mountain, Eton, Tunnel Hill, Cohutta, Chattanooga Valley, La Fayette, Crandall, Sumac, Gregory, Blue Spring, Fairview, Linwood, and Beaverdale. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning/Advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements.
